plot: After eating a cheese cake, a hobo falls asleep and dreams of a vaudeville show performed by bugs.
title: Dreams of the Rarebit Fiend: Bug Vaudeville
plot_es: After eating a cheese cake, a hobo falls asleep and dreams of a vaudeville show performed by bugs.
original_name: Dreams of the Rarebit Fiend: Bug Vaudeville
plot_en: After eating a cheese cake, a hobo falls asleep and dreams of a vaudeville show performed by bugs.
